resources.string: Hide icon labels on home screen
Hide icon labels on app drawer
Please restart the launcher for this changes to take effect!

Please keep in mind: Changing the grid size will mess with your icon order. If you lower the grid size icons will be lost. Increasing the size will bring them back though. Furthermore if the grid size is too high parts of the icons will be cut. Don\Â´t increase it too much.
Dependend on your screen size, increasing the grid cuts parts of the icons.

Hotseat icons are the icons on the buttom above the navigation bar
